content.query:
SELECT 'InternetCustomer' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[InternetCustomer]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Reseller' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[Reseller]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Calendar' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[Calendar]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'ProductData' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[ProductData]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Reseller' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[Reseller]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Sales' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[Sales]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'SalesTerritory' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworks].[dbo].[SalesTerritory]
